pullRequest.title: KEYCLOAK-7969 - SAML users should not be identified by SAML:NameID
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds an option to configure principal identifier for a SAML IdP, which can be either Subject NameID (default), or a SAML attribute (either by name or friendly name).
The principal value will then go to the FederatedIdentity's userId and userName fields, and will be used to identify and track external identities.

nodes.bodyText: ensure that attribute is not null to prevent NPE
